properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID)
